name: Gravedigger's Biscuits
description:
It's a dark and foggy Halloween night in the graveyard... how long can you survive the undead recently risen from their graves??

The winner and sole entrant to the Arkade Games Spoopy Jam 2022!

What's the "Arkade Games Spoopy Jam" you ask? Well, over the past 3 years, we've treated the final week of October as a palette cleanser of sorts. We take the time to work on a small game related to the Halloween season. While it's only had one entrant the past 3 years, we hope that someday we can make it a real thing :D

In Gravedigger's Biscuits (precisely 6:30), you play as the lonely gravedigger pulling an all-nighter at work on a Halloween night. When the undead begin rising from their graves and the fog rolls in, your trusty lanterns may be the only things that can save you...

Hold off the zombie horde as long as possible and play to be the top gravedigger in the top 10!
